thread.title: Prudhomme, Louisiana chef who popularized Cajun food, dies
thread.title_full: Prudhomme, Louisiana chef who popularized Cajun food, dies

title: Prudhomme, Louisiana chef who popularized Cajun food, dies
text:
> Entertainment Prudhomme, Louisiana chef who popularized Cajun food, dies A man looks at the menu outside K-Paul's Louisiana Kitchen in the French Quarter of New Orleans, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. The proprietor, famed New Orleans Chef Paul Prudhomme, passed away Thursday. He was 75. (AP Photo/Gerald Herbert) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
